item.description:
Ward 10 Alderman and West Manchester State Representative Phil Greazzo announced his bid to unseat Lou D’Allesandro in the NH Senate. Phil’s record as state rep. shows that he is championing for smaller government and he will do no less when he is in the senate.
Please jo...in us for some fun and fundraising as we support Phil in his bid for senate.

Where: Mel’s Funway Park 454 Charles Bancroft Highway (Rt 3A) Litchfield, NH 03052

When: August 5, 2012
Time: 1:00p.m.
Cost: $20 covers the cost of mini golf and campaign donation. Additional donations are welcome. If you cannot attend but would like to donate please do so at http://www.philgreazzo.com/

If you are attending the fundraiser in person, please bring cash donations so that Mel’s Funway Park can be compensated and the campaign paid separately. Also, please only RSVP if you are definitely attending so that we can supply the establishment with an accurate head count.

https://www.facebook.com/events/461898403828109/
item.name: Mini Golf for Mini Govt
